author: markt
msg: Use Pattern.quote() as suggested by kkolinko

Tighten up implementation. WS spec (draft 8, section 3.1.1.) states "if the relative path is a URI template (level-1) the request URI matches if and only if the request URI is an expanded version of the URI-template" so every path segment must be present - none can be optional

author: meteatamel
msg: OAK-440 - Concurrency issue when 3 microkernels are writing in the same db

Added more optimized commands: FetchNodesActionNew, CommitCommandNew and GetNodesCommandNew. The main difference is that these commands do not fetch all commits upfront and this improves performance significantly. I'll keep the old commands for now until I'm sure they are not needed.
